title: Top reasons people work with Timothy Long - Imagine Healing
author: Timothy Long
description: Suffering from social anxiety, blushing, complex PTSD, depression, procrastination? Contact Timothy Long, psychotherapist and personal coach
cleaned_text: List of the Top reasons my clients work with me Here are the top reasons my clients work with me and what I have helped people achieve, experience and create: - Overcome anxiety issues, including social anxiety, blushing, self-confidence and low self-esteem issues - Resolve depression - Resolve relationship issues, including difficult communication - Help teenagers and young adults overcome anxiety, blushing, social anxiety, difficult transitions; relationship, family, self-confidence and stress issues common to this age - Learn self-healing, self-care and self-growth methods that will serve for a lifetime - Learn mindfulness, stress-release, centering and meditation skills - Learn various forms of tapping and Emotional Freedom Techniques (EFT) - Discover life purpose, gifts; realize full potential - Gain clarity and make important decisions - Free self expression, as well as public speaking skills - Bring forth and develop creative abilities - Prosperity and abundance coaching - Creating the life you want to live - Develop relationships and deepen Intimacy - Heal boundary and co-dependent issues - Dating and relationship coaching - Resolve sexual and intimacy issues - Release and resolve trauma, PTSD - Clear childhood trauma - Clear relationship trauma, abuse, separation and divorce - Heal grief; healing around death, dying and transitions - Resolve trauma resulting from sexual abuse and harassment - Healing from relationship breakups - Develop relationship to self love and spiritual self - Develop intuition and healing abilities - Healing on all levels: physical, emotional, mental and spiritual
